doc.title: Endless Pursuit
doc.plot: Erotic fiction writer Jeff Gentile makes his screen writing debut with this story about an obsessive writer who overcomes his Endless Pursuit for sexual gratification to discover an even more powerful emotion: love. Brought to the screen by the award winning director Kevin Glover and filmed entirely on location in the Hollywood Hills, this video promises to become a gay erotic classic. With top-notch performances by Thomas Lloyd and Peter Wilder accompanied by a all new, fresh faced supporting cast. Gay love has never been depicted in such a frank and beautiful way.
